quotes.quote: We must not allow the clock and the calendar to blind us to the fact that each moment of life is a miracle and mystery.
Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.
Calendars and clocks exist to measure time, but that signifies little because we all know that an hour can seem as eternity or pass in a flash, according to how we spend it.
I've been on a calendar, but I've never been on time.
More software projects have gone awry for lack of calendar time than for all other causes combined.
Too many people, when they get old, think that they have to live by the calendar.
My death will not be penciled in on someone's calendar.
Death keeps no calendar.
Stop walking with a ‘calendar’. It’s capable of ruining your fate, by showing you the date & limiting your courage, by reminding you of your age.
There is no crime in the cynical American calendar more humiliating than to be a sucker.
The battle for our hearts is fought on the pages of our calendar.
You have to calendar time for yourself even if you have no idea what you're going to do with it.
Most modern calendars mar the sweet simplicity of our lives by reminding us that each day that passes is the anniversary of some perfectly uninteresting event.
The calendar is intolerable to all wisdom, the horror of all astronomy, and a laughing stock from a mathematician's point of view.
There is nothing so intractable as a calendar.
No other date on the calendar more potently symbolizes all that our nation stands for than the Fourth of July.
The calendar was a mathematical progression with arbitrary surprises.
Don't be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of.
Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
Dates in Calendar are closer than they appear! Time is what keeps everything from happening at once. Keep a diary, and someday it'll keep you.
The calendar has a magic that makes us imagine a memory can be resurrected and revived, but nothing returns.
The calendar and the clock are all set by football season and the offseason.
Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.
